title: Tippy and Freckles Great Adventures - City Bound
description: City Bound tells about Tippy, the turtle going on an adventure by himself at first. He gets into a very scary situation, which leads Freckles, the fish to save him. Then Tippy and Freckles enter the part of the city were they meet very interesting people. The sights and sounds of the city surround Tippy and Freckles as they travel through the city and they learn many interesting things.
author: Karen M. Beavers
